entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 6:40 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 98.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
